# discuss.watch â€” AI/Agent Instructions

> Unified forum feed for crypto, AI, and open source communities.
> 100+ Discourse forums aggregated into one API.

## What This Site Does

discuss.watch aggregates discussions from 100+ Discourse-based forums across three verticals:
- **Crypto**: Governance forums (Arbitrum, Uniswap, Aave, ENS, Optimism, etc.)
- **AI/ML**: Research and developer communities (OpenAI, Hugging Face, PyTorch, etc.)
- **Open Source**: Programming languages and projects (Rust, Swift, NixOS, Godot, etc.)

## API Access

Base URL: https://discuss.watch/api/v1

### Endpoints

GET /api/v1
  Returns API documentation and status.

GET /api/v1/forums
  List all available forums.
  Params: category, tier

GET /api/v1/categories  
  List all categories with forum counts.

GET /api/v1/discussions
  Fetch latest discussions from forums.
  Params: forums, category, limit, hot, since, sort

GET /api/v1/search?q={query}
  Search discussions across forums.
  Params: q (required), forums, category, limit

### Example Queries

# Get hot crypto governance discussions
GET /api/v1/discussions?category=crypto&hot=true

# Search for "grants" across all forums
GET /api/v1/search?q=grants

# Get AI research discussions from the past week
GET /api/v1/discussions?category=ai&since=2026-02-10

# Fetch from specific forums
GET /api/v1/discussions?forums=arbitrum,optimism,uniswap

### Response Format

All endpoints return JSON:
{
  "data": [...],
  "meta": { "total": N, ... }
}

### Rate Limits

No authentication required. Please limit to ~10 requests/minute.
Responses are cached (5 min for discussions, 1 min for search).

## Categories

Three top-level categories (legacy subcategory IDs are still accepted as aliases):
- crypto: Blockchain protocols, DeFi, DAOs, governance (~77 forums)
- ai: AI/ML research, safety, developer platforms (~7 forums)
- oss: Programming languages, frameworks, infrastructure (~18 forums)

## RSS/Atom Feeds

Subscribe to discussion feeds:

/feed/all.xml      - All discussions (top forums)
/feed/crypto.xml   - Crypto governance
/feed/ai.xml       - AI / ML communities
/feed/oss.xml      - Open source projects

Only the four top-level feeds above are available (no subcategory feeds).

## MCP (Model Context Protocol)

For agents supporting MCP:

GET /api/mcp
  Returns MCP-compatible tool definitions.

Standalone MCP server available:
  node mcp-server.js

Tools:
- search_discussions: Search across all forums
- get_discussions: Get latest/trending discussions
- list_forums: List available forums
- list_categories: List category structure

## Contact

Part of the Sovereign Signal ecosystem.
https://sovereignsignal.substack.com
